price: Hayo ni kwa sababu waliyachukia aliyo yateremsha Mwenyezi Mungu, basi akaviangusha vitendo vyao.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَرِهُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
footnotes: Mambo yao ni hivyo kwa sababu wao wanakereka na aliyo teremsha Mwenyezi Mungu, yaani Qur'ani na amri zake. Basi Mwenyezi Mungu amevibat'ilisha vitendo vyao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum karihū mā anzala al-lahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
